error_description_general: Even when building the Peace Machine, something can go wrong. Refresh the page or start over by clicking the link below.
explore_toast_from_submit: Thank you. Your memory will be now part of the Peace Machine.
main_description: The Peace Machine is built from different stories, perspectives and the shared will to create peace. Share your own personal memory and you will be part of the Peace Machine. You can also explore memories shared by others.
submit_acknowlegment: Thanks for writing your memory. Now you can share it with others.
submit_disclaimer: I confirm that I am the original author of this memory and have the right to publish it. I also confirm that the text does not contain any personal or sensitive information.
submit_please_extend: Would you like to continue your story?
submit_type_more: You need to share a bit more to participate in building the Peace Machine.
